sentence.Network_en: Some do not have seeds and so cannot be stored on Svalbard.

sentence.Network_en: The rich life of Svalbard, Norway's Arctic archipelago, faces a creeping thaw.
sentence.Network_cn: 生物资源丰富的斯瓦尔巴德群岛, 挪威的北极群岛, 面临逐渐解冻的危机.

sentence.Network_en: Svalbard was chosen because it is cold and remote.
sentence.Network_cn: 之所以选址在此岛,是因为其气候寒冷,地处偏远.
